note: The country Nauru already eradicated polio in 1910 which explains the starting date of this map. The first "larger" countries' eradication of polio can be seen after 1960.
title: Progress towards polio eradication: Endemic countries and polio-free countries
subtitle: Polio-free (not certified) in yellow refers to the time period after the last case of paralytic polio was recorded and before the WHO region was certified polio-free.
